doc:
Tom Verica https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Verica 0 Tom Verica (born May 13, 1964) is an American actor, television director, and producer, best known for his role as Jack Pryor in the NBC drama American Dreams (2002-2005). As director, he is known for Shonda Rhimes' dramas. As of 2012, Verica is co-executive producer of Scandal, and in 2014 he returned to acting in How to Get Away with Murder. Tom_Verica ( born May_13_,_1964 ) is an_American_actor , television_director , and producer , best_known for his_role as Jack_Pryor in the_NBC_drama_American_Dreams ( 2002-2005 ) . As director , he is_known for Shonda_Rhimes '_dramas . As of 2012 , Verica is co-executive_producer of Scandal , and in 2014 he returned to acting in How to_Get Away with Murder .
